desmoj.extensions.visualization3d

Class SpatialVis3DModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.extensions.visualization3d.SpatialVis3DModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VisualModule

    public class SpatialVis3DModule
extends java.lang.Object
implements VisualModule
    This Module visualize the 3D-spatial objects using Java3D.

      • removeVisualizationControl

        public void removeVisualizationControl()
        Description copied from interface: VisualModule
        If a VisualizationControl is set, it will be removed from the module's local attribute by calling this method. This method will be called by VisualizationControl at the removing of the module.
        Specified by:
        removeVisualizationControl in interface VisualModule
